meanings.definition: The act of removing unwanted items or clutter from a space.
meanings.sent1: During the clearouts, we found old toys and books to donate.
meanings.sent2: The clearouts at the garage sale attracted many bargain hunters.
meanings.sent3: The clearouts of the attic revealed forgotten treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the house during the clearouts.
meanings.sent5: The clearouts transformed the messy room into a tidy space.

meanings.definition: A sale in which items are sold at a reduced price to clear out inventory.
meanings.sent1: At the clearouts, customers rushed to grab discounted items.
meanings.sent2: The store's clearouts drew in crowds looking for deals.
meanings.sent3: The clearouts event turned shopping into a fun treasure hunt.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the air during the clearouts was palpable.
meanings.sent5: People lined up early for the clearouts to snag the best bargains.

meanings.definition: To remove or get rid of something.
meanings.sent1: She decided to clearouts her old clothes to make space in the closet.
meanings.sent2: We need to clearouts the clutter from the living room.
meanings.sent3: He tried to clearouts his fear before the big presentation.
meanings.sent4: The storm will clearouts the leaves from the yard.
meanings.sent5: The decision to clearouts negativity brought peace of mind.
